install.name: IceScroller
install.author: IceTheme
install.description: IceScroller Module is ONLY for IceTheme Club Members and can be used ONLY for IceTheme Templates

param.name: icescroller_text
param.label: Pre Text
param.description: The text that is before the scroller

param.name: icescroller_width
param.label: Scroller Width (px)
param.description: Enter the width for the Scroller

param.name: icescroller_height
param.label: Scroller Height (px)
param.description: Enter the height for the Scroller

param.name: icescroller_duration
param.label: Animation Duration (ms)
param.description: How fast do you want a slide to be changed?

param.name: icescroller_delay
param.label: Animation Delay (ms)
param.description: How much do you want to wait until a slide can be changed?

param.name: icescroller_transition
param.label: Transition Effect
param.description: Select a Transmition Effect for changing Items

param.name: icescroller_autoplay
param.label: AutoPlay
param.description: Do you want to enable autoplay so the slides can change automatically.

param.name: icescroller_direction
param.label: Scroller Direction
param.description: How do you want the scroller to change the items?

param.name: catid
param.label: Category Items
param.description: Assign a Category to display Items

param.name: items
param.label: Number of Items
param.description: How many items do you want to display?

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Add a Suffix to IceCarousel Module

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
